Don't have enough time to read all this right now, but to point several things:

1) I was jesting with my post, saying mods would delete it, but Laughing Fish is a moderator.

2) You must acknowledge that Board Moderators are not the same as those in charge of punishing in-game. Board Moderators voluntarily help remove ~~things that trigger people~~ things that break the rules to keep Boards clean, upgrade it where they can etc. They handle bans and reports only as long as it's a post or thread being reported.

In-game reports and bans are handled by very different group of people.
